responses.products: Muna ba da cikakken kewayon kayayyakin sarrafa masana'antu, kayan lantarki, kayan aiki, tsarin hasken rana, da Æ™ari. WaÉ—anne takamaiman samfuran kuke nema?

responses.solarCategory: Muna ba da cikakkun mafita na hasken rana daga bangarori zuwa shigarwa da kulawa. Wane aikin hasken rana kuke shirin yi?
responses.safetyCategory: Tsaro yana da mahimmanci a cikin aikace-aikacen masana'antu. Muna ba da cikakken kewayon kayan kariya da tsaro. WaÉ—anne kayan aikin tsaro kuke buÆ™ata?

responses.electricalTroubleshooting: Zan iya taimakawa wajen gano matsalolin lantarki. Matsalolin gama gari sun haÉ—a da gazawar samar da wutar lantarki, tafiyar kariya ta kewayawa, da batutuwan Æ™asa. WaÉ—anne alamomi kuke fuskanta?

responses.automationSearch: Zan iya taimaka muku samun cikakkiyar mafita ta atomatik! Kewayonmu ya haÉ—a da PLCs, tsarin SCADA, hanyoyin sadarwa na HMI, da cikakkun fakitin sarrafawa.

responses.powerSupplyHelp: Matsalolin samar da wutar lantarki na iya zama masu mahimmanci. Matsalolin gama gari sun haÉ—a da sauyin wutar lantarki, yin lodin fiye da kima, gurbatar jituwa, da gazawar kayan aiki. Bari in taimaka muku samun mafita mai kyau.

responses.plcTroubleshooting: Batutuwan PLC na iya dakatar da samarwa. Matsalolin gama gari sun haÉ—a da kurakuran shirye-shirye, gazawar I/O, kurakuran sadarwa, da batutuwan samar da wutar lantarki. Bari mu dawo da tsarin ku kan layi.
responses.solarPerformanceHelp: Matsalolin aikin tsarin hasken rana na iya yin tasiri sosai ga samar da makamashi. Abubuwan da ke haifar da su sun haÉ—a da kurakuran inverter, lalata panel, shading, da gazawar tsarin sa ido.

chatbotMessages.quoteHelp: Zan yi farin cikin taimaka muku samun faÉ—in farashi na musamman! Farashinmu yana da gasa kuma a bayyane yake. Don daidaitaccen farashi, muna buÆ™atar fahimtar takamaiman buÆ™atunku. Bari mu haÉ—a ku da Æ™ungiyar tallace-tallace don cikakken tattaunawa.

chatbotMessages.businessHoursInfo: Muna nan lokacin da kuke buÆ™atar mu! Lokacin aiki na mu shine Litinin zuwa Asabar: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM. Muna kuma ba da tallafin gaggawa a ranakun Lahadi don mahimman yanayi. An samo asali a Noida, Sector 6, F-25, F Block (metro mafi kusa: Sector 15).
chatbotMessages.pricingInfo: Farashinmu koyaushe yana da gasa kuma a bayyane yake! Mun yi imanin samar da Æ™ima don kuÉ—i ba tare da É“oyayyun farashi ba. Farashin ya dogara da Æ™ayyadaddun bayanai, yawa, da girman aikin. Don mafi daidaitaccen faÉ—in farashi, Æ™ungiyarmu za ta kimanta takamaiman buÆ™atunku.
chatbotMessages.achievements: Muna alfahari da nasarorinmu! An kammala ayyuka masu nasara sama da 500+, abokan ciniki sama da 50+, gogewar shekaru 15+, da haÉ—in gwiwa tare da shugabannin masana'antu kamar Thermax, Motherson, da Praj Industries. Aikinmu na shuka hasken rana na 10MW da tsarin sarrafa magunguna na cikin manyan nasarorinmu ne.
chatbotMessages.mainMenu: Barka da dawowa babban menu! Ina nan don taimaka muku da duk wata buÆ™ata ta sarrafa masana'antu. Ko kuna neman kayayyaki, ayyuka, tallafin fasaha, ko bayanin kamfani, zan jagorance ku zuwa madaidaicin bayani. Da me zan iya taimaka muku?
chatbotMessages.urgentSupport: Batutuwa masu gaggawa sun haÉ—a da: gazawar kayan aiki da ke shafar samarwa, batutuwa masu mahimmanci na tsaro, lalacewa ta gaggawa, lokutan Æ™arewa na shigarwa, da rashin aiki na tsarin. Don waÉ—annan yanayi, kira mu nan da nan a +91-94627-71662. Muna ba da tallafin gaggawa na 24/7 don mahimman yanayi.
chatbotMessages.productComparison: Zan iya taimaka muku kwatanta kayayyaki! FaÉ—in zaÉ“inmu ya haÉ—a da na'urori masu auna sigina, tsarin sarrafa kansa, kayan lantarki, da kayayyakin hasken rana. Gaya mani waÉ—anne takamaiman kayayyaki kuke kwatanta ko wace aikace-aikacen kuke buÆ™atar su, kuma zan jagorance ku zuwa mafi kyawun zaÉ“uÉ“É“uka.
chatbotMessages.quoteTips: Ga wasu nasihu don samun mafi kyawun faÉ—in farashi: 1) Samar da cikakkun Æ™ayyadaddun bayanai da buÆ™atu, 2) Ka ambaci yawan da ake buÆ™ata, 3) HaÉ—a da jadawalin lokacin aikin, 4) Æ˜ayyade wurin shigarwa, 5) Lissafa duk wani buÆ™atu na musamman ko takaddun shaida da ake buÆ™ata. Æ˜arin cikakkun bayanai da kuka bayar, mafi daidaitaccen faÉ—in farashinmu zai kasance!
chatbotMessages.defaultResponse: Na gode da tuntubar mu! Ina nan don taimaka muku samun cikakkiyar mafita ta sarrafa masana'antu. A Powerton Engineering, mun yi imanin cewa kowane abokin ciniki ya cancanci kulawa ta musamman da jagorar Æ™wararru. Wace takamaiman Æ™alubale ko buÆ™ata zan iya taimaka muku da ita a yau?
chatbotMessages.productsPageResponse: Cikakke! Na kai ku shafinmu na kayayyaki inda zaku iya bincika faÉ—in zaÉ“inmu na hanyoyin sarrafa masana'antu. Za ku sami cikakkun bayanai, hotuna, da bayanan fasaha don kowane nau'in samfur. Kuna buÆ™atar taimako wajen nemo wani abu na musamman ko kuna da tambayoyi game da kowane samfur?
chatbotMessages.servicesPageResponse: Kyakkyawan zaÉ“i! Shafinmu na ayyuka yana nuna cikakkun tayin tallafinmu daga shigarwa zuwa kulawa. Mu ne cikakken abokin injiniyan ku don duk tsawon rayuwar aikin. Wane irin tallafin sabis kuke nema?
chatbotMessages.contactPageResponse: Yayi kyau! Shafin tuntuba yana da duk bayananmu gami da wurin ofis, lambobin waya, da fom É—in tuntuba. Muna cikin Noida kuma muna samuwa Litinin-Asabar. Jin kyauta don tuntuÉ“ar kowane lokaci! Akwai wani abu na musamman da kuke son tattaunawa da Æ™ungiyarmu?
chatbotMessages.aboutPageResponse: Abin ban mamaki! Shafinmu game da mu yana ba da cikakken labarin Powerton Engineering - tafiyarmu, nasarorinmu, Æ™ungiyarmu, da Æ™imarmu. Tare da gogewar shekaru 15+ da ayyuka masu nasara sama da 500, muna alfahari da Æ™warewar injiniyanmu. Kuna son Æ™arin sani game da wani takamaiman al'amari?
chatbotMessages.projectsPageResponse: Mai girma! Shafinmu na ayyuka yana nuna fayil É—inmu na nasarar aiwatarwa a cikin masana'antu daban-daban. Daga tsire-tsire masu amfani da hasken rana na 10MW zuwa tsarin sarrafa magunguna, kowane aiki yana nuna Æ™warewarmu ta fasaha. Kuna sha'awar aikin makamancin haka?
chatbotMessages.quotePageResponse: Cikakke! Shafinmu na faÉ—in farashi zai taimaka muku samun cikakken shawarwari daidai da takamaiman buÆ™atunku. Æ˜ungiyarmu za ta tantance buÆ™atunku kuma ta ba da farashi mai gasa tare da bayyanannun sharuÉ—É—a. Wane irin bayani kuke nema don faÉ—in farashi?
chatbotMessages.genericPageResponse: Na umurce ku zuwa shafin da aka nema. Kuna iya samun duk bayanan da suka dace a can. Jin kyauta don bincika kuma ku sanar da ni idan kuna buÆ™atar kowane taimako ko kuna da tambayoyi game da abin da kuka samu!
chatbotMessages.callInitiated: Na fara kiran a gare ku! Æ˜ungiyarmu ta Æ™wararru tana tsaye a shirye don ba da taimako nan da nan. Idan kiran bai haÉ—u ba, zaku iya isa gare mu ta imel ko ziyarci ofishinmu. Ta yaya zan iya taimaka muku a yau?
chatbotMessages.emailOpened: Na buÉ—e abokin ciniki na imel É—inku tare da adireshinmu da aka riga aka cika! Da fatan za a bayyana buÆ™atunku dalla-dalla, kuma Æ™ungiyarmu za ta amsa cikin awanni 24. Don batutuwa masu gaggawa, kiran mu kai tsaye ya fi sauri. Da menene zan iya taimaka muku?
chatbotMessages.externalResourceOpened: Na buÉ—e muku hanyar waje! Kuna iya bincika Æ™arin bayani a can. Lokacin da kuka shirya ci gaba da tattaunawarmu ko kuna buÆ™atar Æ™arin taimako, ina nan don taimakawa. Me kuke so ku yi na gaba?
chatbotMessages.actionCompleted: An kammala aiki! Ina nan don ci gaba da taimaka muku da duk wata tambaya ko buÆ™atu da kuke da ita. Me kuke so ku bincika na gaba?

welcomeMessage: Sannu! Ni ne Mashawarcin Injiniyan ku. Ina nan don taimaka muku samun madaidaicin hanyoyin sarrafa masana'antu, amsa tambayoyin fasaha, da kuma jagorantar ku ta cikin kayayyakinmu da ayyukanmu. Ta yaya zan iya taimaka muku a yau?
